testcase.classname: authStore initial state should have null user and false isAuthenticated initially
testcase.name: authStore initial state should have null user and false isAuthenticated initially

testcase.classname: authStore setUser should set user and isAuthenticated to true when user is provided
testcase.name: authStore setUser should set user and isAuthenticated to true when user is provided

testcase.classname: authStore setUser should set user to null and isAuthenticated to false when null is provided

testcase.classname: authStore setUser should update user data when new user object is provided
testcase.name: authStore setUser should update user data when new user object is provided

testcase.classname: authStore logout should clear user and set isAuthenticated to false
testcase.name: authStore logout should clear user and set isAuthenticated to false

testcase.classname: authStore logout should work even when no user is set
testcase.name: authStore logout should work even when no user is set

testcase.classname: authStore persistence should persist state changes to localStorage

testcase.classname: authStore persistence should handle user object with missing token

testcase.classname: authStore multiple store instances should share state across multiple hook calls
